about_the_game:
"Just Platformer 100 is a new kind of puzzle platformer.
You find yourself at the bottom of a tower with no explanation. Naturally, you start climbing the tower. It seems that the penguin knows why you're climbing. To discover that reason, you'll have to reach the top of the tower.

Features
Simply jumping won't get you far. Just Platformer 100 incorporates puzzle elements into the platforming experience. To progress, you'll need to think.

A new approach to platformers. Just Platformer 100 offers a slow pace and triple jump mechanics. Does that make this game easier than other platformers? No, it doesn't. As soon as you touch the ground again, everything resets. To avoid that, you'll have to solve puzzles while staying airborne.

Rules that accumulate over time. As you progress through the stages, you'll encounter new rules. With each added rule, the gameplay evolves in a different direction. What's more surprising is that the rules don't disappear—they accumulate, continually changing the way the game is played. Discover how these small additional rules dramatically alter the gameplay.

Creativity comes from constraint, not freedom. This is the motto of Just Platformer 100. The game unfolds on a map that's just six tiles wide. See for yourself how complex and deep the game can become in such a confined space.

Successfully crowdfunded in Korea. After releasing a demo version in Korea, the game received positive feedback and successfully completed its funding project.

A game made by a single developer. Creativity isn't just required of the player. This game was developed from start to finish by a single developer, without any external resources. That includes programming, graphics, music, and sound effects. Try to outsmart me in this mental battle. And stay tuned for what's next."
